Slug Generator

Online Slug Generator: Convert Titles to Clean, SEO-Friendly URLs

Easily generate SEO-friendly slugs from any text. Remove accents, special characters, and convert to lowercase URL format.

How to Use the Slug Generator

Follow these simple steps to convert any title or text to a clean slug:

  • Paste or type your text into the input box.
  • The slug will be generated automatically below.
  • Click Copy Slug to save it to your clipboard.
  • Use Clear to reset the fields.

You May Also Need

    Why Use a Slug Generator?

    Slugs are essential for creating SEO-friendly URLs. A good slug enhances readability, boosts indexing performance, and improves your site's click-through rate.

    Benefits of Using Our Slug Generator

    • Strips away accents and special characters for a clean output.
    • Replaces spaces with hyphens, ensuring web-safe URLs.
    • Automatically converts all text to lowercase.
    • Live generation as you type – no delays.

    Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

    What is a slug in a URL?

    A slug is the portion of a URL that uniquely identifies a page using readable keywords, often derived from the page title.

    Can this tool remove accents and special characters from languages like Vietnamese?

    Yes. It normalises unicode and removes accents to ensure clean, standardised slugs.

    Can I use the generated slug in my CMS or website builder?

    Definitely. It works seamlessly with WordPress, Shopify, Haravan, Webflow, and other platforms.

    Is the Slug Generator free?

    Yes. It’s completely free to use with no sign-up required.

    Is it mobile-friendly?

    Absolutely. Our tool is optimised for all devices including smartphones and tablets.
